scripts.dev:backend: cross-env PORT=3002 yarn workspace backend dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cross-env PORT=3001 yarn workspace frontend dev
scripts.dev:proxy: npm run clean:proxy ; docker run --add-host=host.docker.internal:host-gateway --net host --rm --name proxy -p 3000:3000 -v $PWD/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf:ro nginx:alpine
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:proxy"
